Sales_x0020_Reports.Title: Sales By Country
Sales_x0020_Reports.Filter_x0020_Row_x0020_Source: SELECT DISTINCT [Country/Region] FROM [Customers Extended] ORDER BY [Country/Region];

Sales_x0020_Reports.Title: Sales By Customer
Sales_x0020_Reports.Filter_x0020_Row_x0020_Source: SELECT DISTINCT [Company] FROM [Customers Extended] ORDER BY [Company];

Sales_x0020_Reports.Title: Sales By Employee
Sales_x0020_Reports.Filter_x0020_Row_x0020_Source: SELECT DISTINCT [Employee Name] FROM [Employees Extended] ORDER BY [Employee Name];

Sales_x0020_Reports.Title: Sales by Product
Sales_x0020_Reports.Filter_x0020_Row_x0020_Source: SELECT DISTINCT [Product Name] FROM [Products] ORDER BY [Product Name];
